text:
@SenSchumer Maybe you should tell your Democrat colleagues to stop protesting? Not a lot of social distancing there.

Oh wait! According to "experts," Covid-19 only infects those protesting draconian lockdown policies. Protesing for "social justice" & defunding the police? Totally immune!
